name: Nihal Raj E Patil
summary: Immediate joiner, Data Scientist with 4.7 years of expertise in Statistical analytics, Machine Learning, and NLP. Specialized in analytics to transform complex business requirements into actionable data-driven solutions. Developed scalable chatbots and predictive models. Skilled in Python, pytorch, and TensorFlow. Results-driven, consistently delivering projects that positively impact business analytics and growth. Open to new challenges that push boundaries.

experience.description: Worked on LLMs, developed conversational AI chatbots and frameworks, and implemented machine learning solutions for healthcare compliance, driving risk assessment and efficiency.
Engaged in data analytics and model training, focusing on vast datasets and delivering supervised and unsupervised ML algorithms with high accuracy.

education.institution: Dr. D.Y. Patil Institute of Management

projects.title: Revolutionizing Healthcare Compliance
projects.description: Developed a scalable system leveraging pretrained models like Transformers and BERT, implementing on AWS to enhance real-time healthcare risk assessment capabilities and utilizing chatbot interfaces.

projects.title: Enhancing healthcare claim prognostication using advanced machine learning and biomarker analysis
projects.description: Utilized machine learning ensembles and advanced analytics for healthcare claim prognosis, boosting predictive reliability and operational efficiency.

projects.title: Post-Quantum Cryptography Using Machine Learning
projects.description: Researched and implemented machine learning techniques to enhance communication security adapted for the quantum computing paradigm.

projects.title: Quantum Machine Learning for Optimal Portfolio Optimization
projects.description: Explored quantum algorithms for improving financial decision-making via portfolio optimization.
